about_the_game:
Cold War: Frontline

Welcome to Cold War: Frontline, an exciting single-player/multiplayer cooperative PVE tank vehicle shooting game that allows you to experience the ground battlefield during the Cold War. Here, you will drive famous tanks from history and those that have not been mass-produced, and have the opportunity to fight side by side with players from all over the world and face ruthless AI enemies together.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Features:

Historical Reappearance: From the Warsaw Pact to the NATO camp, the game includes real tank models from both sides of the Cold War, each of which has been carefully restored to let you feel the weight of history, even those famous vehicles that have not been mass-produced.

Cooperative Combat: Form a squad with your comrades, work together, formulate tactics, and complete tasks together. Teamwork is the key to survival.

Tactical Strategy: Use terrain, air strikes, artillery bombardment and other support to formulate tactics for your tank squad and challenge more and more AI enemies.

Real Physics: The game uses the advanced Unreal Chaos physics engine to simulate real tank operations, armor-and-bullet confrontation, and physical interaction.

Continuous Updates: The game will be updated regularly with new tank models, maps and missions to keep the game fresh and challenging.

Community Interaction: Join our community or QQ group to exchange experiences with other players, share tactics, or actively propose improvement suggestions. Maybe your ideas will be realized in the next updated version.

Cold War Front is not just a game, it is an adventure through history and a test of courage and wisdom.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now, put on your military uniform and start your tank. The order has been issued!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB and higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 8GB and Support NVIDIA DLSS GPU / higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
